bibl.title: Two Coptic Tax Receipts from Jeme in the Kelsey Museum.
bibl.note: Presentation of two ostraca kept in the Kelsey Museum (Inv. 25069 and 25095 = O. Mich. Copt. 15 and 14). Jeme, 3 and 27 August 727 CE.

bibl.title: Bulletin of the Museums of Art and Archaeology of the University of Michigan

bibl.seg: Terry G. Wilfong, Two Coptic Tax Receipts from Jeme in the Kelsey Museum.
Presentation of two ostraca kept in the Kelsey Museum (Inv. 25069 and 25095 = O. Mich. Copt. 15 and 14). Jeme, 3 and 27 August 727 CE.
